institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 18-2 (Management of Subsidy, etc.)
contents: Article 18-2 (Management of subsidy, etc.) ① The joint training center must manage the subsidy by setting up a separate accounting account and must separately account for its own income and expenditure. ② The joint training center must manage and operate support funds stably and efficiently, such as protecting depositors and opening accounts with high interest rates.
